name: Avia Club Nepal
about: Avia Club Nepal, established in 1996, is a pioneering institution in air sports and ultra-light aviation in Nepal. Founded as a joint venture between Russian, American, and Nepali citizens, the club is registered under the Civil Aviation Authority of Nepal. Since its inception, Avia Club Nepal has been dedicated to providing exceptional sightseeing tours, allowing visitors to experience the breathtaking beauty of Nepal from a unique aerial perspective. With a strong commitment to safety and customer satisfaction, Avia Club Nepal continues to offer unforgettable flying experiences, making it a premier choice for adventure seekers and aviation enthusiasts.
services: ["Full Course with CAAN License\n25 Flying HRS with Club Certificate\n1 HR Solo Flight with Club Certificate"]
